text:
Further,#Hydroxychloroquine (EC50=0.72 μM)was found to be more potent than #chloroquine (EC50=5.47 μM)in vitro

400 mg twice/day of hydroxychloroquine sulfate given orally,followed by a maintenance dose of 200 mg given twice/day for 4 days is recommended for #COVIDー19infection https://t.co/3Q6EjoDUvQ
